Do we get a choice in where we play or did i read that whole thing wrong?{{champion:107}}

You get to choose 2 roles, 1 primary and a secondary, you can also choose a 'fill' role, for an example: I'll pick Mid as my primary... But then I'll play Support if Mid is given to someone else.. And as well, if you pick Fill as your primary role, the secondary role is set as fill as well.
so can you pick fill as a secondary???
Yes you can pick fill as a secondary, after picking your primary; for example midlane.

I think that while this change will make decisions a lot easier, it will also discourage people trying different positions. Maybe you really wanted to play top but got put into the bottom lane, while you might not enjoy it as much because it's not what you wanted you're trying something new and becoming a more rounded summoner on the rift.

Without being forced I don't think nearly as many people will try any other roles and it might negatively affect league in the future.
I take all that back! You can chose to fill.

I think this would decrease the amount of arguments and toxicity in pre - game chat, which is good, and hopefully it will reduce ALL forms of toxicity except for when a player feeds. If a player was given their secondary role, and another player gets that person's first role and the player that got the first role fed, the amount of rage and salt in all-chat would be setting the bar high compared to before.
